headline: Knight Therapeutics and Incyte Amend Supply and Distribution Agreement to Add Retifanlimab and Axatilimab in Latin America
summary: MONTREAL, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Knight Therapeutics Inc., (TSX: GUD) ("Knight") a pan-American (ex-USA) specialty pharmaceutical company, announced today that it has expanded its existing relationship and amended its agreement with Incyte Biosciences International Sàrl, the Swiss-based affiliate of Incyte (NASDAQ:INCY), for the exclusive rights to distribute retifanlimab (sold as ZYNYZ® in the United States and Europe) and axatilimab (sold as NIKTIMVO™ in the United States) in Latin
